title: An exception of type 'System.DllNotFoundException' occurred in SkiaSharp.dll
body:
An exception of type 'System.DllNotFoundException' occurred in SkiaSharp.dll

The issue is releated to #187. Unfortunately I wasn't fast enough to response and the case was closed. I am sorry about my delay. 

Original message:
This exception occurs always when e.g. calling 'SKBitmap bitmap = new SKBitmap(frame.Size.Width, frame.Size.Height, SKColorType.Rgb565, SKAlphaType.Premul);' within an UWP Xamarin project and using any Windows 10 Mobile Emulator or a XBox One as device while running a debug session in Visual Studio.


Does it work in Release? 

No it fails also.

Also, did you install the SkiaSharp NuGet into all the relevant projects (PCL/iOS/Android/UWP)? 

Of course.

Finally, are you able to check if the samples build for v1.54.1: 
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/releases/tag/v1.54.1
 For this, you should download the source using the "Source code (zip)" link at the bottom of the page. v1.55.0 is still in development.

The UWP sample don't work also in both debug and release mode when using a Mobile Emulator or a XBox One as device.

Moreover v1.54.1 uses eglGetProcAddress  in Binding/GRGlInterface.cs, what causes your app fails to pass the Windows Store certification process.

Any help is welcome. Thank you and sorry again.
